trends: There have been 29 other sightings in Levittown
There were no other sightings in Levittown on or around May 17th 2013
divs: Sighting DetailsI was walking out to my shed at 9:30 pm when I noticed a bright red light in the sky. I watched it for a while wondering iChat star it was. Then I noticed it sort of blinking. Hovered then moved slowly, picked up speed then stopped. It grew brighter for a while then started flickering red and white. Then it dissipated . I called my daughter out to see what I was looking at as a second pair of eyes. She saw appx 1-2 minutes before it disappeared . There were 2 planes flying in the area at the same time.
Object Flight Path: Path with directional change,Path then hovering
Summary: Bright star like light that moved.
